wikipedia_page.main: George Innes Donaldson (born 24 November 1954) is a retired Scottish professional football player who is best known for his time with Rangers and Heart of Midlothian.

response: * George Donaldson (musician), (1968—2014), Scottish musician and a member of Irish singing group Celtic Thunder
* George Donaldson (footballer), (born 1954) Scottish footballer with Rangers and Hearts
